name: Clown Theft Auto: Woke City
description:
Welcome to Woke City. Welcome to the 2030s.



Woke City is the city of future, dreams and hope. Imagine a perfect society where everything is built on equality, where crimes are nonexistent, and anger is just a theory of the past. Immerse yourself into the wokeness. This is the future everyone wants and needs.

Clown Theft Auto Woke City's features:

  • Open world
  • Driving & Flying systems
  • Health & Hunger systems
  • Money system
  • Real Estate system (houses & businesses)
  • NPCs to interact with
  • Mini quests to enjoy

And much more! Only in Clown Theft Auto Woke City.
